data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Savinjska, Slovenia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Savinjska, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Savinjska, Slovenia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, teach the 548 believers in the state of Savinjska the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Lord, to the people of Savinjska you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Rogaška Slatina
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Rogaška Slatina, Savinjska, Slovenia.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Savinjska access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 263,400 souls living in the state of Savinjska with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Savinjska that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

location.name: Savinjska
location.cities_list: Celje, Velenje, Rogaška Slatina, Žalec, Slovenske Konjice
